name: color chaos infinity survival [ccis]
description:
A little survival game made by a 16 years old teenager.

MONSTERS

Eye =  will follow you when you're not looking. 

Slime = when it dies it will spawn a smaller slime. 

Ghost = will follow you when he sees you. 

Mini slime = just a mini slime. 

and more...

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

CONTROLS

arrow keys = move

left mouse button = shoot

right mouse button = use

r = restart

shift = take the gun

cursor = aim

///THANKS/////

my sis: some sprites

my friends: some ideas

////////Programer

G4m3r11

beta version and github: https://g4m3r11.itch.io/infinity-color-chaos-bread
